title: The British isles,
author: Tomlinson, Everett T.
snippet: In other houses we are interested in the exhibits of pitcher-plants and orchids, and we stop at the great tank where the beautiful flower named for Queen Victoria (Victoria Regia) is in bloom. There is a great Rock Garden, too. On the waters of the pond near by are scores of pelicans and other strange water birds that have been brought

title: Bonnie Hills o'Hame, and other gems. [Verses.]
author: Scott, William
